text: @ChuckCallesto @hydehunter2017 Every governor who ordered covid19+ patients into unprepared & unequipped nursing homes. PA Wolf, NJ Murphy,  NY Cuomo, MI Witmer, NV etc & are the same who threatened Doctors & pharmacists for dispensing hydroxychloriquine. Blood on their hands.
